summary: British police are after a serial killer who lures his female victims through newspaper personal ads and sends cryptic-poem clues to the cops.
cast: George Sanders|Lucille Ball|Charles Coburn|Boris Karloff|Cedric Hardwicke|Joseph Calleia|Alan Mowbray|George Zucco|Robert Coote|Alan Napier|Tanis Chandler|Annette Warren|John Alban|Jimmy Aubrey|Brooks Benedict|Wilson Benge|Paul Bradley|Colin Campbell|Jack Chefe|Ann Codee|Charles Coleman|James Conaty|Sayre Dearing|Jack Deery|Cyril Delevanti|Harry Evans|Herbert Evans|Charles Ferguson|George Ford|Alex Frazer|Mary Jane French|Rudy Germane|Joe Gilbert|Herschel Graham|Marion Gray|Robert Haines|Stuart Hall|Gerald Hamer|Sam Harris|Marjorie Hoshelle|Shep Houghton|Isabel La Mal|Ethan Laidlaw|Mike Lally|Ethelreda Leopold|Carl M. title: El asesino poeta
